results.title: Mikania micrantha Extract Inhibits HMG-CoA Reductase and ACAT2 and Ameliorates Hypercholesterolemia and Lipid Peroxidation in High Cholesterol-Fed Rats
results.text_hl: Meanwhile, the administration of EAMMS extract (50, 100 and 200 mg/kg) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg) significantly reduced (p < 0.05) the levels of TC, @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@TG@@@, LDL-C and @CHEMICAL_Malondialdehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008315 @@@MDA@@@ compared to @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Pyruvate_Carboxylase_Deficiency_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015324 @@@PC@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Ibrahim A, Shafie NH, Mohd Esa N, Shafie SR, Bahari H, Abdullah MA. Mikania micrantha Extract Inhibits HMG-CoA Reductase and ACAT2 and Ameliorates Hypercholesterolemia and Lipid Peroxidation in High Cholesterol-Fed Rats Nutrients. 2020 Oct 9;12(10):. PMID: 33050310
